set(PROJECT_NAME lzma)

################################################################################
# Source groups
################################################################################
set(Source_Files
    "../../common/debug_lib_check.cpp"
    "lzma.cpp"
)
source_group("Source Files" FILES ${Source_Files})

set(Source_Files__7Zip_Common
    "C/7zTypes.h"
    "C/LzFind.c"
    "C/LzFind.h"
    "C/LzHash.h"
    "C/LzmaDec.c"
    "C/LzmaDec.h"
    "C/LzmaEnc.c"
    "C/LzmaEnc.h"
)
source_group("Source Files\\7Zip Common" FILES ${Source_Files__7Zip_Common})

set(VPC_Scripts
    "../../vpc_scripts/platform_dirs.vpc"
    "../../vpc_scripts/source_base.vpc"
    "../../vpc_scripts/source_lib_base.vpc"
    "../../vpc_scripts/source_lib_win32_base.vpc"
    "../../vpc_scripts/source_lib_win32_debug.vpc"
    "../../vpc_scripts/source_lib_win32_release.vpc"
    "../../vpc_scripts/source_video_base.vpc"
    "../../vpc_scripts/source_win32_base.vpc"
    "../../vpc_scripts/version.vpc"
    "lzma.vpc"
)
source_group("VPC Scripts" FILES ${VPC_Scripts})

set(ALL_FILES
    ${Source_Files}
    ${Source_Files__7Zip_Common}
    ${VPC_Scripts}
)

################################################################################
# Target
################################################################################
add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} STATIC ${ALL_FILES})

use_props(${PROJECT_NAME} "${CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES}" "${DEFAULT_CXX_PROPS}")
################################################################################
# Target name
################################################################################
set_target_properties(${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTIES
    TARGET_NAME_DEBUG   "lzma"
    TARGET_NAME_RELEASE "lzma"
)
################################################################################
# Output directory
################################################################################
set_target_properties(${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTIES
    OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG   "${MYROOTDIR}/../game/bin"
    OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE "${MYROOTDIR}/../game/bin"
)
################################################################################
# MSVC runtime library
################################################################################
get_property(MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY_DEFAULT TARGET ${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTY MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY)
string(CONCAT "MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY_STR"
    $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:
        MultiThreadedDebug
    >
    $<$<CONFIG:Release>:
        MultiThreaded
    >
    $<$<NOT:$<OR:$<CONFIG:Debug>,$<CONFIG:Release>>>:${MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY_DEFAULT}>
)
set_target_properties(${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTIES MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY ${MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY_STR})

################################################################################
# Include directories
################################################################################
target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE
    "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../common;"
    "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../public;"
    "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../public/tier0;"
    "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../public/tier1;"
    "C"
)

################################################################################
# Compile definitions
################################################################################
target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE
    "$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:"
        "DISABLE_ETW;"
        "_DEBUG;"
        "DEBUG;"
        "_SCL_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS"
    ">"
    "$<$<CONFIG:Release>:"
        "NDEBUG;"
        "_ALLOW_RUNTIME_LIBRARY_MISMATCH;"
        "_ALLOW_ITERATOR_DEBUG_LEVEL_MISMATCH;"
        "_ALLOW_MSC_VER_MISMATCH"
    ">"
    "VPC;"
    "RAD_TELEMETRY_DISABLED;"
    "WIN32;"
    "_WIN32;"
    "_LIB;"
    "_CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE;"
    "_CRT_NONSTDC_NO_DEPRECATE;"
    "PLATFORM_32BITS;"
    "COMPILER_MSVC32;"
    "COMPILER_MSVC;"
    "LIBNAME=lzma;"
    "BINK_VIDEO;"
    "AVI_VIDEO;"
    "WMV_VIDEO;"
    "DEV_BUILD;"
    "FRAME_POINTER_OMISSION_DISABLED;"
    "_NO_EXCEPTIONS;"
    "_LZMA_PROB32;"
    "_7ZIP_ST;"
    "SOURCE1=1;"
	"FUCK_STEAM;"
    "_MBCS"
)

################################################################################
# Compile and link options
################################################################################
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE
        $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:
            /Od;
            /ZI
        >
        $<$<CONFIG:Release>:
            /O2;
            /Ob2;
            /Oi;
            /Gy;
            ${DEFAULT_CXX_DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT};
            /Ot;
            /Zo;
            /Oy-
        >
        /MP;
        /permissive;
        /GF;
        /W4;
        /WX-;
        /TP;
        /fp:fast;
        /GR;
        /wd4316;
        /wd4577;
        /wd4091;
        /Gw;
        /Zc:inline;
        /Zc:threadSafeInit-;
        /Wv:18;
        /GS;
        /Zc:wchar_t;
        /Zc:forScope;
        
    )
    string(CONCAT FILE_CL_OPTIONS
        "/Y-"
    )
    source_file_compile_options(../../common/debug_lib_check.cpp ${FILE_CL_OPTIONS})
endif()
